comments:
N20050609-0010

I cannot reproduce reliably, but this exception sometimes happens when I open
the quick refactor menu by pressing Alt+Shift+T shortly after having edited and
saved a CU. When I press Alt+Shift+T again, the menu opens without problems.

Looking at the code the only thing that can happen is the nodes == null.

Markus, what do you think ?

Was able to reproduce. The problem is indeed that nodes can be null. 

I checked all callers of resolveSelectedNodes and they handle null cases.

Fixed for RC2.

When verifying check that the extract temp/local action still shows up in the
context menu where it makes sense.
